markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bizarre Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=761) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You can draw upon strange variations in your spellcasting, whether or not you can cast occult spells. The DCs to Recognize Spells you cast and Identify Magic you use increase by 5.
name: Bizarre Magic
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 258 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your magic becomes more difficult to identify.
</summary>
summary: Your magic becomes more difficult to identify.
